full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): ` RLUNG RTA DAR BAR BYED PA'I BSANGS MCHOD YID BZHIN NOR BU ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , `RLUNG RTA DAR BA'I BSANGS MCHOD ME TOG 'PHRENG BA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, , ` RLUNG RTA DAR BAR BYED PA'I BSANGS MCHOD YID BZHIN NOR BU NI, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @006B (ZHES RLUNG RTA DAR BAR BYED PA'I BSANGS MCHOD YID BZHIN NOR BU 'DI NI BLA MA DAM PA GONG MA RNAMS KYI GSUNG RGYUN LAS 'BYUNG BA LTAR, MDOR BSDUS NAS RANG DANG SKAL BA MNYAM PA'I GZHAN LA PHAN PA'I LHAG BSAM DKAR BAS, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BIKshU'I GZUGS BSNYAN SNYOMS LAS PA RATNA MING CAN GYIS BRIS PA'O, ,'DI LA NOR 'KHRUL CI MCHIS PA MKHAS RNAMS KYIS KHREL MED BZO BAR MDZOD, )
